channel.title: Should i do RSC Or RS2?
channel.description:
Hi guyz , well im new to P-servers, although i have been coding for yr's , mostly java and C++ , amongst other languages....
But i was just woundering, what do you all think is the best kind of server to start coding, Runescape Classic.. , or Runescape 2 ?
Just want to hear your opinions about it... , and also , not sure if i posted this in right section , but im sure its close enough ... :P

item.title: Should i do RSC Or RS2?
item.dc:creator: @Javas_My_Betch Javas My Betch
item.description:
@Javas_My_Betch wrote:

flipmc:

Java can add anything she wants

Who the hell sed i was a girl lol

Read full topic

item.title: Should i do RSC Or RS2?
item.dc:creator: @flipmc flipmc
item.description:
@flipmc wrote:

Well it was just a suggestion, Java can add anything she wants
but you know, you gotta have some backup if you forget some of the coding you’ve learned right?

item.title: Should i do RSC Or RS2?
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

I say, take your coding ability and test it by attempting a RSC server, as there are probably no tutorials.
Btw, whoever said to use RS2 because of the tutorials, copying and pasting a tutorial isn’t coding.

Read full topic
item.source: Should i do RSC Or RS2?

item.title: Should i do RSC Or RS2?
item.dc:creator: @Javas_My_Betch Javas My Betch
item.description:
@Javas_My_Betch wrote:

[quote=“flipmc, post:2, topic:105817”]RSC would be a bad idea since the features are crap.

Just use RS2, many tutorials on it on the, Tutorial list.
[hr]
[size=8pt]Owner Of:[/size] [size=8pt]AbandonedScape[/size]
[size=8pt]Credits:[/size] [size=8pt]Flip & LeScape PK[/size]
[size=8pt]Progess: [ [size=8pt]|[/size][size=8pt]|||||||||[/size] ][/quote]
Hmm , ok , well thanks for your opinion, i was headin towards RS2 myself… , and i wud rather make a RS2 server than RSC , because i have seen the big amount of resource’s there are for RS2 servers, and the little amount of Resources there are for RSC

Read full topic
